headline: MetLife Investment Management Agrees to Acquire Traditional Fixed Income and Equity Portfolio Management Teams Managing $6 Billion From Mesirow
summary: WHIPPANY, N.J., January 08, 2025--MetLife Investment Management (MIM), the institutional asset management business of MetLife, Inc. (NYSE: MET), today announced that it has reached a definitive agreement to acquire three investment teams and assets managed by Mesirow, an independent, employee-owned financial services firm. MIM is acquiring the high yield and bank loan, strategic fixed income and small-cap equity teams and certain related investment products.
